title: JGMedhurst
author: JGMedhurst
content: Hi Guys,I know it an ask but I am currently studying for a MSc in Finance & Accounting and an completing a dissertation on the above subject. I have put together an imbedded questionnaire, takes about 5 - 10 minutes to complete and I am ideally looking for people with an awareness of CC's.I have attached the link below:https://cardiffmet.eu.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_b9ET6JoqPTI7QFgIf you know of colleagues, friends or family that are knowledgeable about cryptocurrencies, particularly those who own cryptocurrencies, please can I ask you share the link.Cheers,James

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Done.You should probably explain what a tax wrapper is though. It's the first time I have ever heard of such a phrase.

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Done Hopefully you can give us some general feedback of the results in the future Â Good luck with your studies

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: JGMedhurst on September 13, 2022, 12:56:24 PMIf you know of colleagues, friends or family that are knowledgeable about cryptocurrencies, particularly those who own cryptocurrencies, please can I ask you share the link.The following communities or rather subreddits might come in handy in getting more responses to your questionnaire:Note: Make sure to check their rules first!r/BitcoinUKr/Crypto_Generalr/CryptoTechnologyBtw, I also answered it
